Title: Dhaka Attack
Writer: Sunny Sanwar (script), Abhimanyu Mukherjee (screenplay), Sunny Sanwar (screenplay), Dipankar Dipon (screenplay), Hasanat Bin Matin (dialogue), Asad Zaman (dialogue)
Actors: Arifin Shuvo, Mahiya Mahi, ABM Sumon, Quazi Nawshaba Ahmed
Plot: An anonymous criminal gang plot a series attack in Dhaka City and three young police officers work on this.
